title: 2022 Canyon Spectral all-mountain goes big in new Alloy, Kids, CFR & Mullet trail to enduro bikes
content:
Canyon’s Spectral all-mountain bike family just got a lot bigger, with a whole suite of siblings for last winter’s Spectral CF 29. Now there are three wheelsize options – either 27.5″, 29″, or a mullet combination. Next, looking at frame materials, last year’s revamped CF carbon frameset now gets a more affordable alloy version or

The post 2022 Canyon Spectral all-mountain goes big in new Alloy, Kids, CFR & Mullet trail to enduro bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
